entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
